messages.subject: Too radical? & intro
messages.msgSnippet: Aha! This is the kind of person I was hoping to meet!! On one of the local lists I belong to, there s no controversy allowed! As soon as anyone mentions an
messages.messageBody:
Aha! This is the kind of person I was hoping to meet!! On one of the local lists I belong to, there's no controversy allowed! As soon as anyone mentions an iffy topic (last one was vaccination) the list owner demands silence!!. before a discussion even starts.....boring.......

I'm really enjoying this list. I don't think I've introduced my self yet. I'm Kerrin, I live in New Zealand. My 5 unschooled kids are blossoming after nearly 3 years out of school. I have taken all that time to deschool myself and I'm now feeling confident, most of the time. I've almost jumped into a couple of discussions, but been too busy. Any time now I'll reach the point where I can't help myself!

Kerrin.


I got kicked off a list!!..................
I was too radical and they decided to quickly silence me.
sigh....
